column4: please HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ubuntu can not see my pCMCIA Cards...
do you have it in " lspci "?
yes , it is listed there CardBus bridge: Toshiba America Info Systems ToPIC97
then, insert your card, do lspci again
okay, you need the driver for pcmcia, let me find the module name
please check the private chat window...
couldn't see your card in lspci?
kernel: [ 2554.763716]  pccard: PCMCIA card inserted into slot 1
but after that it says kernel: [ 2554.763769]  cs: unable to map card memory!
it is network adapter, but I have another one, also the Modem Pcmica and it is same an all of them..
which model of the NIC card?
